trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL transaction to be made at a data source.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma transação SQL a ser feita em uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The application creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> object by calling <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo cria um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> objeto chamando <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> no <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction) are performed on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> object.
trans-unit.target: Todas as operações subsequentes associadas à transação (por exemplo, confirmar ou anular a transação) são executadas a <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> e um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
trans-unit.target: Confirma a transação do banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> e um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao tentar confirmar a transação.

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: A transação já foi confirmada ou revertida.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: A conexão foi desfeita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> object associated with the transaction, or <see langword="null" /> if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> associado à transação ou <see langword="null" />, se a transação não for mais válida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> associado à transação.

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: Um único aplicativo pode ter várias conexões de banco de dados, cada uma com zero ou mais transações.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você determine o objeto de conexão associado a uma transação específica criada por <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> para essa transação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> para essa transação.

trans-unit.source: The default depends on the underlying ODBC driver.
trans-unit.target: O padrão depende do driver ODBC subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para transações paralelas.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the whole transaction.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> se aplica a toda a transação.

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
trans-unit.target: Reverte uma transação de um estado pendente.

trans-unit.source: The transaction can be rolled back only from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: A transação pode ser revertida somente de um estado pendente (após <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> foi chamado, mas antes <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A> é chamado).

trans-unit.source: The transaction will be rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: A transação será revertida novamente caso seja descartada antes `Commit` ou `Rollback` é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> e um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Rollback%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao tentar confirmar a transação.

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: A transação já foi confirmada ou revertida.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: A conexão foi desfeita.
